transcript.speaker: Sinbad
transcript.text: Hi, I'm Sinbad from ambush.tv. We're spending about 8 hours per week on manual content scheduling.

transcript.speaker: You
transcript.text: Tell me more about your current process and team size.

transcript.speaker: Sinbad
transcript.text: We have a team of 5 content creators. We use spreadsheets to track everything. Our email is sinbad@ambush.tv and we lose about 20% productivity to manual processes.

transcript.speaker: You
transcript.text: What are the biggest pain points you're experiencing?

transcript.speaker: Sinbad
transcript.text: The main issues are: 1) We manually copy-paste content between platforms, 2) No automated scheduling, 3) We miss deadlines because of manual tracking. It's costing us about $2000 per month in lost productivity.

transcript.speaker: You
transcript.text: Have you looked at any automation solutions before?

transcript.speaker: Sinbad
transcript.text: We tried Zapier but it didn't handle our complex workflows. We need something that can integrate with our custom CMS at ambush.tv and also handle multi-platform posting.

transcript.speaker: You
transcript.text: What would success look like for you in 6 months?

transcript.speaker: Sinbad
transcript.text: Ideally, we'd reduce manual work by 80%, have automated scheduling across all platforms, and get back those 8 hours per week. That would free up our team to focus on creative work instead of admin tasks.
